Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: @cascrypto There will be a huge update to the Komodo code base on December 15th so everyone who uses Agama wallet or runs the Komodo daemon will beed to update before Dec 15. Here is some more info: https://komodoplatform.com/upgrade-guide-dec-15/

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: The rebrand is a separate matter. We're in the process of creating a new logo with new colors and typeface, a new website, and a new GUI for the wallet. You can learn more about the rebrand here: https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-rebranding-update/

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: The donation is related to donating funds to random people in Venezuela via airdropvenezuela.org.

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: The Komodo rewards are a function of the blockchain that rewards users with a certain amount of KMD. It's 5% annually for the Komodo you hold in your address (10 KMD and above)

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: you should claim rewards every month. If you don't it will stop accruing.

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: Here is an article explaining the Komodo blockchain reward: https://komodoplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KPSD/pages/71729215

Author: coingirl87#6489
Content: Thx but for me its important which impact has reward for speculative period in germany. In germany the situation is, that if you get interest from cryptocurrencie the soeculative period will extend from 1 year to 10 years...so i have to wait 10 years to sell without taxes.

Author: coingirl87#6489
Content: So maybe someone of you has experience with taxman how to explain that reward has no impact to speculative period
